card.wallet_desc: Every card is linked to a Starknet wallet address. You can use your existing wallet or let us create a brand-new one just for this card.
card.wallet_why_new_desc: A fresh wallet keeps your card activity completely separate from your main wallet. No one can trace your card transactions back to your primary holdings — giving you an extra layer of financial privacy.
card.wallet_address_hint: The on-chain address that owns and controls this card.
card.wallet_setup_hint: Generate a fresh Starknet wallet for this card
card.wallet_what_is_desc: A wallet is your on-chain identity. It holds your funds and signs every transaction. Your recovery phrase (12 words) is the master key — anyone who has it controls the wallet. Never share it, never screenshot it. Write it down on paper, store it somewhere safe offline, then it will be wiped from this page.
card.wallet_seed_hidden: Hidden for security — copy or download to save
card.wallet_seed_hidden_hint: Your 12 words are hidden. Copy or download to save them — they will be wiped afterwards.
card.wallet_save_warning_desc: It will not be shown again and we do not store it. If you lose these 12 words, access to this wallet is permanently lost.
card.wallet_wiped_desc: Wiped from this session. Only your wallet address is stored.
card.pin_desc: Create a numeric PIN to secure every transaction. The PIN never leaves your device — only the derived public key is stored on-chain.
card.pin_derived_locally: This value is derived locally and sent to the smart contract.
card.pin_forget_warning: If you forget your PIN you can rotate to a new one later — but you'll need the old PIN to do so. Choose something memorable.
card.currencies_desc: Select which tokens this card can accept for payments. All tokens have live Pragma oracle price feeds on Starknet.
card.payment_desc: Choose how the card sources tokens for payments and when merchants receive their funds.
card.payment_mode_hint: How the card sources tokens when a merchant charges you.
card.payment_merchant_token_desc: Pay in the exact token the merchant requests
card.payment_any_token_desc: Auto-swap from any held token via DEX
card.settlement_hint: When the merchant receives the funds after a charge is executed.
card.limits_desc: Set transaction and daily spending caps to stay in control of your card usage.
card.delays_desc: Control how long external transfers settlements are held before execution. Set to instant (0) to disable.
card.delays_transfer_hint: Hold period before external transfers execute. Protects against unauthorized withdrawals.
card.delays_settlement_hint: Hold period before merchant receives funds after a charge.
card.review_desc: Review your card configuration below, then hit Create Card to deploy on Starknet.
card.review_secure_desc: Keys never leave your device. Only the public key & config are sent to chain.
card.err_set_wallet_first: Go back to Step 1 and set your wallet address first.
card.err_wallet_gen_failed: Failed to generate wallet. Ensure crypto libraries are loaded.
card.err_pin_derivation_failed: Failed to derive PIN key. Please try again.
card.card_saved: Card details saved. Ready to submit.
card.card_queued: Card deployment sent to queue. It will be ready soon.
card.card_create_failed: Failed to create card. Please try again.
card.download_file_warning: KEEP THIS FILE SAFE. Anyone with these words can control your wallet.
card.deploying_desc: Please wait while your card is deploying...
card.card_undeployed_desc: Still deploying. This can take a few minutes. Please wait...
card.card_deployed_desc: Your card is live and ready to use! You can manage it from your dashboard, view transactions, and start spending.
card.card_deploy_failed_desc: Card deployment failed. Please try redeploying. If the issue persists, contact support.
card.failed_redeploy: Failed to redeploy card. Please try again.
card.card_requeued: Card redeployment queued. It will be ready soon.
card.freeze_desc: Freezing your card will block all transactions. You can unfreeze at any time to restore functionality.
card.withdraw_funds_desc: Transfer to another wallet or card.
card.direct_deposit_desc: Send supported tokens directly to your card's smart contract address on the Starknet network.
card.bridge_deposit_desc: Bridge assets from another network directly into your card via Layerswap.
card.p2p_deposit_desc: Receive tokens from other users by sharing your card's deposit address or QR code.
card.warning_direct_deposit: Only send tokens supported by this card. Other assets sent to this address may be permanently lost.
card.bridge_desc_warning: Bridging assets directly into your card is powerful but can be risky if not done carefully. Please double-check the source network, token, and amount before confirming.
card.source_address_required: Source address is required for bridge deposits
card.invalid_bridge_config: Invalid bridge configuration. Please check your selections and try again.
card.send_payment_desc: Please send the exact amount below to the address given to complete the bridge.
card.do_not_send_other_assets: Sending other assets will result in permanent loss.
card.bridge_status_desc: This page will automatically update once the payment is detected on-chain.
card.bridge_not_found: Bridge transaction not found. Please check the details and try again.
card.bridge_failed: Bridge transaction failed. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.
card.bridge_payment_waiting: Waiting for payment to be detected on-chain. This can take a few minutes depending on network congestion.
card.bridge_payment_pending_desc: Payment detected! Sending funds to your ZionDefi card...
card.bridge_payment_failed_desc: There was an issue with the bridge transaction. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.
card.bridge_payment_received_desc: Your funds have been successfully bridged and are now available on your card.
